regmod_action.description: Action associated with the regmod operation

regmod_count.description: Searchable. Count of regmod events reported by the sensor since last initialization

regmod_excluded_count.description: Count of excluded regmod events, as reported by the sensor since last initialization

regmod_name.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Full path of the registry key(s) modified by the process

regmod_new_name.description: Searchable. New registry key name; renamed keys only (regmod_action=ACTION_RENAME_KEY)

regmod_old_name.description: Searchable. Old registry key name; renamed keys only (regmod_action=ACTION_RENAME_KEY)
